attributes.action: request that the BBC refer to all foreign locations by their (traditional) ENGLISH names (e.g. Munich not Munchen, Rome not Roma, Ceylon not Sri Lanmka, Burma not Myanmar)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I tried "ensure" but it seems that's outwith the government's powers. But "request" is surely possible.

Ivory Coast instead of the rather silly Cote d'Ivorie is another example.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
